subject: Running a test under two different runners.
msgSnippet: Suppose I have a test class, which I want to run with two different Runners.  How would I do so without having to duplicate the test class (such that each copy
messageBody:
Suppose I have a test class, which I want to run with two different
Runners. How would I do so without having to duplicate the test class
(such that each copy has a different RunWith annotation)?
